MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG9 postcode area of Stranraer. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have established a damaged pole near to Garthleary and are currently in the process of replacing this pole and  we now expect your supply to be restored by 1am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 10.57pm on Tuesday 8th December 2020.
